definition: to arrange/to order about/to manipulate
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
variant of 布[bu4]/to announce/to spread

sentences.english: The Chinese people henceforth got rid have been organized the human , allow to oppressed's destiny .
sentences.chinese: 中国人民从此摆脱了受人摆布，任人宰割的命运。

sentences.english: After all, traders in Shanghai still are prone to extravagant mood swings.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，上海的交易者仍有过度受情绪摆布的倾向。

sentences.english: The alcohol stuns the little buggers, making them sluggish and easier to handle.
sentences.chinese: 酒精会使之昏迷，这样就使它们更容易被人摆布了。

sentences.english: We're the Illuminati , and we are not done.
sentences.chinese: 我们是光照派，我们绝不任人摆布。

sentences.english: South Georgia suffers from a meteorological version of bi­polar disorder.
sentences.chinese: 南乔治亚岛经受着极地紊乱气候的无情摆布。

sentences.english: They were lost at the sea, at the mercy of the wind and weather.
sentences.chinese: 他们在海上迷了路，任凭风和天气的摆布。

sentences.english: You may haudio-videoe some difficulties in selecting railway transport I guess.
sentences.chinese: 我猜你们摆布铁路运输有贫窭。

sentences.english: This puts consenting adults at the mercy of the Greek bureaucracy.
sentences.chinese: 这使得希腊政府的官僚能任意摆布参与交易的人。

sentences.english: Are we the puppets of fate?
sentences.chinese: 我们是听任命运摆布的块垒吗？

sentences.english: She had her husband by the short hairs.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫完全任由她摆布。

sentences.english: Province of left and right sides of completely state-owned at that time half alleges want project of semiconductor of mount a horse.
sentences.chinese: 那时全国有一半摆布省份传布宣扬要上马半导体项目。

sentences.english: She abandoned her baby to fate.
sentences.chinese: 她让自己的婴儿任由命运摆布。

sentences.english: I knew I controlled the situation, and I manipulated her.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我控制了局面，对她任意摆布。

sentences.english: I dreaded going over to D hall to be manipulated by prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 我对走进D厅受那些罪犯的摆布心怀忧惧。

sentences.english: Don't toe the line just as it is grotesque , left to the mercy of it.
sentences.chinese: 不要因它怪诞就俯首听命，听任它的摆布。

sentences.english: They were lost at sea, at the mercy of the winds and waves.
sentences.chinese: 他们在海上迷失了方向，任由风浪摆布。
